author: dcreager
msg: This patch adds a pkg-config description file for the Avro library.
Makes it easier to determine the right CPPFLAGS and LDFLAGS needed to

author: norman
msg: Add a new interface called MessageSearchIndex and an implementation which use lucene to index messages and make it possible to search within a mailbox in a performant way. This is just the first part of it as we need to think about howto invoke the MessageSearchIndex. See MAILBOX-10

author: coheigea
msg: Changed how issuer DNs are populated in Issuer Serial after finding an interop bug with a Metro endpoint.

author: dcreager
msg: Adding dcreager to Avro credits page
